about_the_game:
The Yellow Dream

Backrooms: The Yellow Dream is a Horror, Survival game where you need to collect Items, such as food and water to survive while you wander around the backrooms. You can craft your own items like Guns, Cams and more.

While you're in your duty you can also build your own base with such things. Each level waits the player with different monsters and different mechanics. Every monster you'll encounter will try to kill you by tons of ways. Don't forget your main job is to finding much more and exploring the backrooms itself!

Everything you need to do!

  • Investigate The Backrooms - You are going to visit there for a reason. You can go by on your own or play with your friends! Play by your rules or do a teamwork it's all up to you! Can you survive while collecting data for your life?

  • Apeirophobia - Anytime you no-clip to a level you'll face different places and different dimensions. No map is like any. At the same time all levels are colossal which you need to count the seconds, don't get lost.

  • Safety is %0 - In your mission you'll face with many monstrosities. Yeah maybe not all of them are hazardous but not everyone is trustworthy at all. Be careful who you talk to. They might not be them... Keep moving and stay in light! It's safer there...

  • End-of-Duty Evaluation - Each time you do your job you will be tested with some criteria. Which will affect your Final Rank. Do your best to survive and gather more data about Backrooms.

  • Not Without Supplies! - You need water to survive. Haha how ironic? You will find more items throughout your scary adventure. Store as much item as you can. Each day new items will appear. But do NOT forget that not everything you consume is not going to be good for you, think twice!

  • Fight Against Them - You can craft your weapons and try to kill those monsters! But remember that not every monster is mortal. Don't waster your belongings by trying to kill the invincible.

WARNING! - READ THIS PARAGRAPH BEFORE PLAY

This game contains a lot of horror materials such as jumpscares, loud noises, very bright lights etc.

If you have a physical or mental illness or any of your relatives had similar seizures we recommend you to not play this game otherwise Crow Games does not take any responsibility!

IMMEDIATELY STOP PLAYING if you begin to experience these symptomes below: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions.

You may reduce risk by doing the following: sitting farther from the screen, lowering your screen brigtmess, using a smaller screen, play in a good-lit room, not playing when you feel anything not right, not using headphones and anything that could trigger.

Have fun :)

content_descriptors.notes: Mostly there are monsters who will create violence in the game but as well as wanderer, because they're not as good as angels. Such as Guns, Sharp Objects, Falling from High Places etc.

name: Backrooms: The Yellow Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA Virtual Audio Device (Wave Extensible) (WDM)
  • Additional Notes: Warning! With these options the game may work slower!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA Virtual Audio Device (Wave Extensible) (WDM)

short_description: A wanderer who will survive face to face with unknown creatures of the Backrooms. Build your base, craft your very own weapons and keep yourself alive! Search for an exit while you feel the fear to the core! Are you ready? Because Backrooms: The Yellow Dream is going to push your limits!
